'''Beta 1.11.0.10''' is the eighth and final beta version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.11.0]], released on April 11, 2019,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360026708251|title=Minecraft Beta - 1.11.0.10 (Xbox One/Windows 10/Android)|date=April 11, 2019}}</ref> which optimizes performance around [[village]]s and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Optimizations'''
* Optimized the use of target selectors.
* Made various performance optimizations around [[village]]s.

'''[[Seed picker]]'''
* Removed most content in the seed picker with 7 original seeds remaining, added 11 more.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed villagers wandering constantly when there is no village nearby. ({{bug|MCPE-43958}})
* Fixed a crash that sometimes occurred after opening the skin picker.
* Fixed local multiplayer games not being playable between Nintendo Switch devices after playing a regular multiplayer game.</onlyinclude>
